title: SHAPOORJI SENSORIUM
detail: SHAPOORJI SENSORIUM seamlessly integrates luxury with serene living in an upscale neighborhood. These thoughtfully designed 2 and 3 BHK residences offer expansive layouts that provide both comfort and sophistication. Enjoy upscale features such as high-end modular kitchens, advanced climate control systems, and stylish glass partitions. With beautifully landscaped gardens, private balconies, and exclusive amenities like a fully equipped fitness center and elegant communal spaces, SHAPOORJI SENSORIUM is where refined living meets tranquility.
regulatory_approval_detail: Sensorium Phase I : P52100024963, Phase II : P52100024964, Phase III : P52100024965, Phase IV : P52100027244, Phase V : P52100027234, Phase VI : P52100045257, Phase VII : P52100049547
developer_detail: Shapoorji, with a legacy spanning over 150 years, isn't just a builder; they are architects of dreams, constructing not just homes but fulfilling lifestyles. Their commitment to quality is evident in their iconic projects, which have become synonymous with luxury and innovation. From state-of-the-art residential towers to sprawling townships, Shapoorji Pallonji offers a diverse portfolio that caters to every aspiration.
city_description: Hinjawadi Phase 1, located in the heart of Pune's IT hub, is a bustling micro-market that has witnessed unprecedented growth in recent years. This vibrant locale is a magnet for young professionals and tech enthusiasts, thanks to its proximity to major IT parks and corporate offices. The area boasts a thriving social infrastructure with a plethora of restaurants, cafes, and entertainment options, ensuring a dynamic and fulfilling lifestyle.
